body_html:
I am not sure if we actually need to compute backward pass with strings. Usually people deal with strings at preprocess steps, which there is no need to backpropagate.

Yet, is possible to backpropagate with strings any way, even with the current tf.string_split implementation ?

body:
I am not sure if we actually need to compute backward pass with strings. Usually people deal with strings at preprocess steps, which there is no need to backpropagate. 

Yet, is possible to backpropagate with strings any way, even with the current tf.string_split implementation ?
